message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the ideal water temperature for different tasks. When washing laundry, dishes, or taking a bath, it is important to have water that is warmed to acceptable temperatures. This is because warm water helps to effectively remove dirt, bacteria, and oils. Option (A) is incorrect because seven pails for water is unnecessary and unrelated to water temperature. Option (B) is incorrect because having a hot water heater in the city does not guarantee the proper temperature for these tasks. Option (C) is incorrect because a large brush for scrubbing is not necessary for all tasks and unrelated to water temperature.
